Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定當做排序準則的屬性名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the property name being used as the sorting criteria.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性應該是基礎集合中項目的公用屬性。This property should be a public property of the items in the underlying collection. 字串會解譯由特定物件參與排序。The string is interpreted by the particular object involved in the sorting. 僅支援簡單的資料行名稱。 only supports simple column names. 支援一般的屬性路徑並`XPath`針對[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)]資料。 supports general property paths and `XPath` for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xml-md.md)] data. 因此，當檢視已物件，您可以排序[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)]中的節點根據這些節點的屬性。Therefore, when the view is a object, you can sort [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xml-md.md)] nodes in an based on an attribute of those nodes. 比方說，如果屬性名稱是`Cost`，您會指定 「@Cost」 的在。For example, if the attribute name is `Cost`, you would specify "@Cost" for the in the .
